field.name: description
field.value:
This patch allows castle trunk to be built against the latest NHibernate trunk code. Mostly it deals with changes on the ISession interface, with a few other little changes here and there. Also fixes a compile fail against the latest newtonsoft json.net lib (not included in this patch - who is signing this library for use in castle?).
I have run as many of the tests as I can, but I am getting a build failure on the monorail tests:
"C:\<my castle path>\trunk\common-project.xml(144,6): Property evaluation failed. Expression: $(assembly.sign)
Property 'assembly.sign' has not been set."
I haven't seen that before.
Is it ok to apply, and does anyone want to verify these changes before I apply?
